ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: But saying that skills only show level+1 when you learn them is misleading.  That was my point. If we do that here and are not correct...then others are gonna
ygData.messageBody:
But saying that skills only show level+1 when you learn them
is misleading. That was my point.

If we do that here and are not correct...then others are
gonna say..."What the heck is going on? I thought my
research should have said 17 not 2." I think that people
make "Formulas" way too fast.

That can be a detriment to people here. Not all people take
things with a grain of salt. I know that from trying to
charge 1-2 plat for bindings...They don't understand that I
really don't want to take the time to find them...cast the
spell...and meditate the mana back for a measly 4 gold...I
could kill one Orc warrior for 2 plat..and take less time.

And before you people attack my comments....I am not flaming
anyone...just stating an opinion on these formulae's out
there...I have seen TOO many that are not correct.
